  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A LEAKING CORROSIVE HAZMAT ON THE UNLOAD DOOR 25. USING ALL PROPER PPE AND DECISION TREE, THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED SPILL TUB AND MOVED TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
